channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2023090670
item.description:
Report X-2023090670

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-17T15:12:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE ARRIVED FROM HUB. PACKAGE WS TAKEN OFF TRAILER AS DAMAGED. DescribePack: PACKAGE WAS WET AND APPEARED AS TWO BOTTLES HAD LEAKED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: AT UNLOAD, PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A DAMAGE BIN AND BROUGHT TO QA FOR INSPECTION.
